title: BRIEF-Heat Biologics Reports Data From Phase 2 Trial Of HS-410 Combined With Bacillus Calmette-Guérin For Treating Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer
text: Market News March 26, 2018 / 11:51 AM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Heat Biologics Reports Data From Phase 2 Trial Of HS-410 Combined With Bacillus Calmette-Guérin For Treating Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Heat Biologics Inc: * HEAT BIOLOGICS - REPORTS 2 YEAR DATA FROM PHASE 2 TRIAL OF HS-410 COMBINED WITH BACILLUS CALMETTE-GUÉRIN FOR TREATING NON-MUSCLE INVASIVE BLADDER CANCER * HEAT BIOLOGICS - WITHIN SUBGROUP OF PATIENTS WHO RECEIVED LOW DOSE OF CO'S IMPACT HS-410 WITH BCG, 10 OUT OF 10 REMAINED DISEASE FREE AFTER 2-YRS Source text: ( bit.ly/2pGwsuk ) Further company coverage:
